product_name: The North Face Betasso Trail-Running Shoes - Girls'
long_description: The North Face Betasso girls' shoes will have your young ones racing up and down the trails or across the playground with confidence and ease. Synthetic leather uppers with highly breathable nylon mesh are flexible and abrasion resistant. Wicking nylon linings allow moisture vapor to escape. Removable X-2(TM) footbeds supply lightweight cushioning. Lightweight EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and shock absorption. Multidirectional UltrATAC(TM) rubber outsoles supply dependable traction on uneven terrain. .
short_description: The North Face Betasso girls' shoes will have your young ones racing up and down the trails or across the playground with confidence and ease.
